page.title: 09AMENITIES AND RECREATION 2
page.content: {BARNTON AND LITTLE LEIGH 03600375} AMENITIES AND RECREATION 2. Barnton British Legion Club:Committee run, snooker, darts, dominoes, bingo played, stage for cabaret acts.Dancing to live bands.Amateur boxing tourna- ments, silver band based.Youngers Ales Barnton Memorial Hall:Old school, Parish Council controlled.Parish Council meeting place.Burial Board. League of Friends, luncheon club, Old Friends Club, Football Club, Keep Fit, Slimming Club.Little Miss Barnton Annual Fete.Others:Nursery Road Recreation Field - Football pitch, rough ground, swings and climbing frame.Runcorn Road and Central Drive play areas - all controlled by Parish Council.Canal Towpath:pleasure/holiday craft from nearby marinas.Walks, fishing (10lb carp).Country lanes.
